document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2021-06
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON, CALIFORNIA, APPROVING A CHANGE TO THE ZONING MAP (AMERICAN CANYON MUNICIPAL CODE CHAPTER 19.03 ZONING MAP) TO DESIGNATE A VACANT 7.2-ACRE PARCEL ON THE EAST SIDE OF OAT HILL SOUTH OF NAPA JUNCTION ROAD (PARCEL B) FROM ESTATE RESIDENTIAL (RE) TO MEDIUM DENSITY RESIDENTIAL (RM), ASSESSOR'S PARCEL NUMBER 058-320-001 (FILE NO. PL20-0026)
